siteMetadata.title: Shilpi Agrawal
siteMetadata.subtitle: Blog of poems, experiences, product management, personal opinions

frontmatter.title: Who Am I?
frontmatter.description: A long poem written by Shaista and I depicting the haphazard, clogged, jumbled up internal existential crisis. This poem is an attempt to address overarching dilemmas. It's an attempt to ask the moral, philosophical and ethical questions. A world-full of people moving towards stress and anxiety, the poem asks some ignored questions. I hope our poem reaches some people asking difficult questions in life.
